scripts.clean-install: rm package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm install
scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.woff src/**/*.woff2 src/**/*.json src/**/*.svg dist
scripts.analyzer: npm run build && node dist/wifi-analyzer-cli.js wlp8s0mon
scripts.sniffer:managed: npm run build && node dist/sniffer-managed.js wlp8s0
